channel.title: Omg how come all the servers are down!
channel.description:
:mad: i need help realy bad is it my computer or mopar scape 3.2 that isnt working i dont wanna make my own server i want to play others please help!!@@@@@@@@@@
P.S: when u look at this thread and u know what to do please help i want to play!

item.title: Omg how come all the servers are down!
item.dc:creator: @LoveScaper LoveScaper
item.description:
@LoveScaper wrote:

[quote=“hippie, post:8, topic:134883”][quote author=LoveScaper link=topic=186297.msg1685070#msg1685070 date=1187502340]
omg why are you being gay and not going to a different one
[/quote]
wtf are you superflamer?
gtfo of these fourums… or learn some respect. your worse then a two year old.

slade, the servers are most likely down. moparserver status page only updates every thirty minuts. try new IPs, if they dont work be patient. no offence but this board isnt for these kinds of questions.[/quote]dude shutup that’s flaming also

Read full topic
